artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Funazu Chūjirō
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 334.51; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), fig. 104, p. 282.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: woman standing at right in profile from PL, with long bushy hair, wearing a pink robe and a beaded belt in green, yellow and brown; woman standing in the mouth of a cave, with view of figures outside including man at left wearing white and red; cloud of pink smoke behind figures outside cave
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Mirror of Famous Generals of Great Japan (Dai Nihon meishō kagami 大日本名将鑑)
title: The Sun Goddess Amaterasu Ōmikami
